an6.83:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo aggam dhammam arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.83:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappi hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti, kaye ca jivite ca sapekkho hoti.
an6.83:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo aggam dhammam arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.83:2.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhabbo aggam dhammam arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.83:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirima hoti, ottappi hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti, kaye ca jivite ca anapekkho hoti.
an6.83:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhabbo aggam dhammam arahattam sacchikatun”ti.
